item.title: Kalman
item.description: – Such filter is such a general and powerful tool for combining information in the presence of uncertainty. – You can use a Kalman filter in any place where you have uncertain information about some dynamic system, and you can make an educated guess about what the system is going to do next. – And it can take advantage of correlations between crazy phenomena that you maybe wouldn’t have thought to exploit!
